**Summary**
• Ethereum staking queue now bigger than exits, fears of a sell-off dying down.
• Staking rewards are keeping people locked in, no mass dump coming.
• ETH price holding steady, proving the ecosystem’s still got backbone.
Impact — Ethereum’s staking momentum signals a strong, stable foundation for long-term growth.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/business/2025/09/05/ethereum-staking-queue-overtakes-exits-as-fears-of-a-sell-off-subside
